resources.string: A strong CV is crucial if you want to land interviews for the best jobs, so this video breaks down the CV writing process into simple steps.

The average Software Engineer tends to be confident and insightful, enjoying deep discussion to understand a particular issue. They may seem introverted in high-pressure environments, especially when faced with conflict and dissenting opinions.
